name: Winter (fashionbatman)
description:
Controls

Walk: Arrow Keys/WASD

Interact: Space Bar

Try to find shelter in the harsh wilderness. Follow the trails of yellow sparkles. Offer trinkets to fires to reveal new trails. There are 4 trinkets around the environment.

Made for Ludum Dare 45 in 48 hours by Christian Smith

Rate the game here

Game made in Unity

Art made in Gimp

Sounds made in FL Studio

Project files can be downloaded below.
